text:
[Remote] Junior Frontend Developer (React JS) - PV 1 Round - USA Blockchain Company
â–  Qualifications:
â— Intermediate English
â— 2+ years of professional experience with React JS + responsive web
â— Demonstrated knowledge of databases, networking, security, privacy, and compliance for Web-based applications.
â— Experience with cloud services (AWS, Google Cloud)
â— Experience with unit testing and virtualized environments using Docker
â— Experience using version control systems (Git)
â— Ability to write thorough, scalable and clear design documentation.
â— Ability to work within a distributed team environment wearing multiple hats.
â— Ability to thrive in a startup environment
Nice to have:
â— Games, e-commerce, or payment gateway integration
â— Blockchain and/or distributed systems
â– Salary : ~$1200 net + Token bonus
â– Working time : Monday-Friday (Flexible)
â– Benefits & Perks:
- Work off on Saturday and Sunday by weekly, public holidays according to Vietnam labor Law.
- 100% remote
- Competitive Salaries
- Annual leave
- Probation time : 100% salary
- Token Bonus
-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\
Gmail/Skype: Khahan.viecoi@gmail.com
Mobile/Zalo: 0913 032 097

â— Demonstrated knowledge of databases, networking, security, privacy, and compliance for Web-based applications.
â— Experience with cloud services (AWS, Google Cloud)
â— Experience with unit testing and virtualized environments using Docker
â— Experience using version control systems (Git)
â— Ability to write thorough, scalable and clear design documentation.
â— Ability to work within a distributed team environment wearing multiple hats.
â— Ability to thrive in a startup environment
Nice to have:
â— Games, e-commerce, or payment gateway integration
â— Blockchain and/or distributed systems
â– Salary : ~$1200 net + Token bonus
â– Working time : Monday-Friday (Flexible)
â– Benefits & Perks:
- Work off on Saturday and Sunday by weekly, public holidays according to Vietnam labor Law.
- 100% remote
- Competitive Salaries
- Annual leave
- Probation time : 100% salary
- Token Bonus
